'''Sharp Point''' is a castle in [[the Crownlands]], the region controlled directly by the [[Iron Throne]] in [[King's Landing]]. The castle is located north of [[Stonedance]], at the end of a peninsula where the southern portion of [[Blackwater Bay]] meets [[the Narrow Sea]].<ref>"[[The Wolf and the Lion]]"</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels Sharp Point is located at the end of Massey's Hook and is the seat of House Bar Emmon, a noble house sworn to [[Dragonstone (castle)|Dragonstone]]. The castle is a large watchtower upon which a great fire burns atop.
